page.shortlink: ux control properties javascript on select
page.description: Fires when the user selects text in the control.

description.p: An object that contains properties and methods for inspecting and manipulating the browser event. This object can be referenced in JavaScript added to the event, either through Action Javascript or using *[ui:Text Mode]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onSelect]* event fires when the user selects text within a TextBox or TextArea control. Selection is when the user highlights text in a text control. Selection is often used when choosing text to copy from the control.

page.note: Some controls do not support the onSelect event.
